name: On Basoeki's Recreation
description:
One of Basoeki Abdullah painting is tittled "Empat Bidadari Mandi di Sungai" (Four Angels Bathing in the River). Basoeki Abdullah is a prominent mooi indie artist after Raden Saleh era in Indonesia, which expose beauty of nature and woman.

In this photo, I reverse the image depicted by Basuki. I chose to photograph four men freely swimming in a rural river. Then stack it with the image of a modern space: doors, windows, motors. In addition, in the right corner there is a female figure that was accidentally photographed. I'm wondering what would it be when we are get used of malegaze, how would it be with femalegaze?
